com.m2ps.interchange

Class IsoInterchangeRequestListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jpos.util.Log
      • com.m2ps.interchange.IsoInterchangeRequestListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.jpos.core.Configurable, org.jpos.iso.ISORequestListener, org.jpos.util.LogSource

    public class IsoInterchangeRequestListener
extends org.jpos.util.Log
implements org.jpos.iso.ISORequestListener, org.jpos.core.Configurable
    This class is responsible for processing messages received from remote networks, and placing them on the appropriate Transaction Manager pipeline. When configured on the source side, the messages will typically be placed on the internal Transaction Manager request pipeline. When configured on the sink side, the messages will typically be placed on the internal Transaction Manager response pipeline. Ultimately, the space & queue onto which the messages are placed are configured in the appropriate QBean configuration.

      • forwardMsgFromRemote

        public void forwardMsgFromRemote(org.jpos.iso.ISOSource isoSource,
                        org.jpos.iso.ISOMsg message)
        This method is used by the interchange to forward messages received from the remote network, and place them on the internal Transaction Manager request or response pipeline. i.e. this can be used on both source and sink interchanges.
